summary: The state’s move continues a trend of state-level regulators moving faster than the feds on regulating crypto.
title: Washington State Joins Celsius Bankruptcy Case as Interested Party
content: The bankruptcy case of beleaguered crypto lending platform Celsius Network has a new interested party: the Washington State Department of Financial Institutions.
Read more: Celsius Network Might Be Planning to Turn Its Debt Into Crypto ‘IOU’ Tokens

entity.type: Washington State Department of Financial Institutions
